cloud.name: Free States
cloud.description: Survivalist separatists. Bunkers, traps, and independence.

fire.name: The Forged
fire.description: Raiders obsessed with fire and iron. "Forged in the flame."

sword.name: Brotherhood of Steel
sword.description: Military order. Hoards advanced tech. Heavy armor presence.

temple.name: Followers of the Apocalypse
temple.description: Pacifist medics and scholars. "Knowledge for the people."

taoist.name: The Institute
taoist.description: Covert research network. Synth rumors persist.

blood.name: The Disciples
blood.description: Sadistic raiders. They enjoy the kill more than the loot.

lotus.name: The Gunners
lotus.description: High-end mercenaries. Combat armor, laser weapons, no morals.

jiuyou.name: The Railroad
jiuyou.description: Underground operators. Codes, safehouses, and secrets.

star.name: Reilly's Rangers
star.description: Elite mapping unit. Explorers of the unknown.

dragon.name: The Pack
dragon.description: Animalistic raiders. Survival of the fittest. Colorful armor.

phoenix.name: The Responders
phoenix.description: Emergency services. Firefighters, police, and medics rebuilding.

thunder.name: The Enclave
thunder.description: US Government remnants. Advanced Power Armor and Vertibirds.

ice.name: Children of Atom
ice.description: Worshippers of the Glow. "Bask in Division."

poison.name: Caesar's Legion
poison.description: Slaver army modeled after Rome. Machetes and discipline.

illusion.name: The Great Khans
illusion.description: Proud warrior tribe. Drug runners and survivors.

diamond.name: Atom Cats
diamond.description: Power Armor enthusiasts. "Coolest cats in the wasteland."

yinyang.name: The Operators
yinyang.description: Profit-driven gang. Stylish armor, pragmatic, deadly efficient.

purpleFlower.name: Mutant Blossom
purpleFlower.description: Rare crafting material. Grows on irradiated cliffs.

cleansePill.name: Cleanse Chem
cleansePill.description: Removes radiation poisoning. Slightly increases max health.

beastCore.name: Mutant Core
beastCore.description: Core from a powerful mutant beast.
